Package com.flipkart.business

Interface CustomerInterface

All Known Implementing Classes:
CustomerService
public interface CustomerInterface
Interface defining the operations available to customers in the system. This includes managing bookings, retrieving gym information, and handling user account operations.

  • Method Details

    • cancelSlots

      boolean cancelSlots(int slotId)
      Cancels a slot booking for a customer.
      Parameters:
      slotId - The ID of the slot to be canceled.
      Returns:
      true if the slot is successfully canceled, false otherwise.

    • getAllBookings

      List<Bookings> getAllBookings(String userId)
      Retrieves all bookings associated with a specific user.
      Parameters:
      userId - The unique identifier of the user whose bookings are to be retrieved.
      Returns:
      List of Bookings objects detailing all bookings made by the user.

    • getAllGymsWithSlots

      List<Gym> getAllGymsWithSlots()
      Retrieves all gyms along with their available slots.
      Returns:
      A list of all Gyms with their respective slots included.

    • getAllGymsByArea

      List<Gym> getAllGymsByArea(String area)
      Retrieves gyms based on their location area.
      Parameters:
      area - The geographic area to filter gyms by.
      Returns:
      A list of Gyms located in the specified area.

    • bookSlots

      boolean bookSlots(int gymId, int time, String email)
      Books a slot for a gym session for a specified gym and time.
      Parameters:
      gymId - The ID of the gym where the booking is to be made.
      time - The time slot to book.
      email - The email of the user making the booking.
      Returns:
      true if the booking is successful, false if the booking fails.

    • validateUser

      boolean validateUser(String username, String pass)
      Validates a user's login credentials.
      Parameters:
      username - The username or email of the user.
      pass - The password provided by the user.
      Returns:
      true if the credentials are correct, false otherwise.

    • createUser

      boolean createUser(User user)
      Registers a new user in the system.
      Parameters:
      user - The User object containing the details of the new user.

    • verifyGymUserPassword

      boolean verifyGymUserPassword(String email, String password, String updatedPassword)
      Verifies and updates the password for a gym user.
      Parameters:
      email - The email of the user whose password needs verification and updating.
      password - The current password for verification.
      updatedPassword - The new password to update to.
      Returns:
      true if the password is successfully updated, false if verification fails.

    • updateGymUserPassword

      boolean updateGymUserPassword(String email, String password, String updatedPassword)
      Updates the password for a gym user.
      Parameters:
      email - The email of the user whose password is to be updated.
      password - The current password for verification.
      updatedPassword - The new password to set.
